nodes.text: A songwriter, was a Gungan considered to have mastered the craft, composed the song "Booombaaa Boombaa Bombashella" for the Twi'lek entertainer Anj'a. It became a number-one galactic hit. One of Anj'a's performances of the song, on the planet Corellia, inspired the painting Intense Performer, copies of which were available for public purchase at some point after the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War.

This songwriter was mentioned in the description of the painting Intense Performer, featured in the 2003 MMORPG Star Wars: Galaxies: An Empire Divided after a 2010 contest. The winner, a player named Anj'a, had her painting and its backstory inserted into the game.
